title: PM grieved over death of Malawi vice president in a plane crash
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday expressed his deep grief over the death of Vice President of Malawi Saulos Chilima in a tragic plane crash.
The prime minister expressed solidarity with the government and the people of Malawi in the hour of grief and sympathised with the bereaved family.
Saulos Chilima died in a plane crash along with nine other passengers, the countryâ€™s President Lazarus Chakwera announced in an address to the nation.
The aircraft went missing after it failed to land at the Mzuzu International Airport, about 380 km to the north of the capital Lilongwe. The wreckage of the plane has been located, Chakwera said.
